thread.title: Augustine Okrah named SWAG Ghana premier league player for the year 2014
thread.title_full: Augustine Okrah named SWAG Ghana premier league player for the year 2014

title: Augustine Okrah named SWAG Ghana premier league player for the year 2014
text:
19:40 CET Augustine Okrah named SWAG Ghana premier league player for the year 2014 - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Former Bechem United attacker Augustine Okrah was crowned the best First Capital Plus Premier League player for the year 2014 by the sports writers association of Ghana. 
Okrah, who now plays his football with Sudanese side Al Merreikh scored 16 goals for Bechem United in the 2014/2015 First Capital Plus Premier League. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
